detail_desc: Oversized polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft, fluffy yarn with a V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft, fluffy yarn with a V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft, fluffy yarn with a V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumper knitted in soft, fluffy yarn with a V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length jacket in a patterned viscose weave with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. No fasteners.
Flared tulle skirt with a flock print, elastication with a flock print at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in tulle with sequins and appliqués. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Satin lining.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs, one pair with marbled plastic pendants.Size approx. 2-5 cm.
Hoop earrings in metal and plastic. Three pairs in a solid colour and one patterned pair. Diameter 1.7 cm.
Hoop earrings in metal and plastic. Three pairs in a solid colour and one patterned pair. Diameter 1.7 cm.

Playsuit in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with wide shoulder straps, buttons at the top, flap chest pockets, side pockets and welt back pockets. Detachable belt at the waist and short, wide legs with creases at the front.
Earrings in plastic and metal with hoops at the bottom. Length 5 cm.
Earrings in plastic and metal with hoops at the bottom. Length 5 cm.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a deep neckline at the front.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a deep neckline at the front.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a deep neckline at the front.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Wide trousers woven in a striped viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with a small frill trim, pleats at the top and detachable tie belt. Zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and straight legs.
Relaxed-fit joggers in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button and pockets front and back. Tapered legs with elastication at the hems.

Flared blouse in crisp cotton with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and a yoke with gathers front and back. Frills at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs.

Flared blouse in crisp cotton with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and a yoke with gathers front and back. Frills at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip on the inside and adjustable straps with metal buckles. Fabric linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heels 3.5 cm.
Warm-lined boots in woven fabric and imitation leather with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Faux fur linings and insoles and sturdy, patterned soles.
Warm-lined boots in woven fabric and imitation leather with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Faux fur linings and insoles and sturdy, patterned soles.

Base layer tights in jacquard-patterned, fast-drying functional fabric. Low waist with a wide, ribbed waistband, and ribbed panels on the legs. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
T-shirt in soft cotton with contrasting colour panels along the shoulders and sleeves.

Single-breasted jacket in a viscose weave with peak lapels, jetted front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Ankle-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave with a high waist with covered elastication and an underskirt.
Maxi dress in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wrapover front and narrow ties at the waist that fasten on one side. Lined.
Maxi dress in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wrapover front and narrow ties at the waist that fasten on one side. Lined.

Long dress in an airy weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a V-neck with a small opening and tie detail at the top. Concealed zip in one side and a seam below the bust with pleats to create width in the skirt. Lined.

Cropped top in seersucker made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with elastication and a frill at the top, a sweetheart neckline and buttons down the front. Short, raglan puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim.

Long jacket in soft viscose twill with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Short top in an airy weave with a sheen. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the top.

Wide tunic in pattern-weave cotton with a small stand-up collar, opening at the front and ties at the top. Dropped shoulders and long wide sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs. Tiers and a flounce at the hem.
